mapper.select: select pi.*, pr.pr_name, pr.pr_id, pa.pa_id, pa.pa_name, st.st_name, ss.ss_quantity from staff st join progressInspection pi on pi.st_id = st.st_id join shippingStatus ss on pi.ss_id = ss.ss_id join purchaseorder po on po.po_id = ss.po_id join procurementplanregistration ppr on po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id join contract co on ppr.co_id = co.co_id join estimate es on co.es_id = es.es_id join partner pa on es.pa_id = pa.pa_id join product pr on pa.pr_id = pr.pr_id;

select pi.*, pr.pr_name, pr.pr_id, pa.pa_id, pa.pa_name, st.st_name, ss.ss_quantity from staff st join progressInspection pi on pi.st_id = st.st_id join shippingStatus ss on pi.ss_id = ss.ss_id join purchaseorder po on po.po_id = ss.po_id join procurementplanregistration ppr on po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id join contract co on ppr.co_id = co.co_id join estimate es on co.es_id = es.es_id join partner pa on es.pa_id = pa.pa_id join product pr on pa.pr_id = pr.pr_id where pi.pi_id = #{pi_id}

select pi.*, pr.pr_name, pr.pr_id, pa.pa_id, pa.pa_name, st.st_name, ss.ss_quantity from staff st join progressInspection pi on pi.st_id = st.st_id join shippingStatus ss on pi.ss_id = ss.ss_id join purchaseorder po on po.po_id = ss.po_id join procurementplanregistration ppr on po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id join contract co on ppr.co_id = co.co_id join estimate es on co.es_id = es.es_id join partner pa on es.pa_id = pa.pa_id join product pr on pa.pr_id = pr.pr_id where pi.ss_id = #{ss_id}
mapper.update: update progressInspection set pi_order = #{pi_order}+1, pi_inspectedDate = now(), pi_content = #{pi_content}, pi_uninspectedQuantity = #{ss_quantity} - #{pi_inspectedQuantity}, pi_inspectedQuantity = #{pi_inspectedQuantity} where pi_id = #{pi_id}
